Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic had a vintage performance with 37 points, 18 rebounds, and 15 assists.
Post-Match Reflections: The Mavericks need to start finding some answers after dropping to 5-5 overall and 1-4 in clutch situations.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks had 62 points in the paint.
The game was a close 122-120 loss for the Mavericks.
Others: Quentin Grimes not getting any minutes as a solid defender is a curious decision.
Luka Doncic has struggled with his efficiency this year, especially from three-point range.
